w: we do not write you anything
as a pledge of what is to come
as a pledge of what is to come
we are at home [in this body]
we are out of our mind
Make room for us in your hearts
we want you to know about
we are taking great care to do
most of them [ to do likewise ]
I may not need to be
I do not want to seem
we were the first to reach
I will continue to do so
as if I were out of my mind
Although there is nothing to gain
I am in no way inferior
I will not be a burden
I will not need to be
